column2: title=Gandalf's Battle on the Bridge in the Mines of Moria

column1: '''''Gandalf's Battle on the Bridge in the Mines of Moria''''' is a New Age spiritual book (teaching the doctrines of [[Wikipedia:Ramtha's School of Enlightenment
column2: Ramtha's School of Enlightenment]]) which lends its title from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Middle-earth]].
